mapper.select: SELECT cs.CANCER_STUDY_IDENTIFIER AS cancerStudyIdentifier, gp.STABLE_ID AS stableId, gp.NAME AS profileName, gp.DESCRIPTION AS profileDescription, gp.GENETIC_ALTERATION_TYPE AS geneticAlterationType, gp.DATATYPE AS datatype, gp.GENERIC_ASSAY_TYPE AS genericAssayType, gp.SHOW_PROFILE_IN_ANALYSIS_TAB AS showProfileInAnalysisTab, gp.PIVOT_THRESHOLD AS pivotThreshold, gp.SORT_ORDER AS sortOrder, gp.PATIENT_LEVEL AS patientLevel FROM genetic_profile gp JOIN cancer_study cs ON gp.CANCER_STUDY_ID = cs.CANCER_STUDY_ID WHERE cs.CANCER_STUDY_IDENTIFIER = #{studyId} AND gp.GENETIC_ALTERATION_TYPE = #{geneticAlterationType} AND gp.DATATYPE = #{datatype}
